modName: Khajiit Night Eye Toggle and Detect Life Lesser Power
summary: Lets the Khajiit hunt more efficiently by making Night Eye indefinite and allowing the player a moment of detect life.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod aims at making the Khajiit better thieves and hunters by giving them the abilities that should be inherit to their race. Night Eye has been made indefinite and is renamed to \"Eyes of the Predator.\" A new lesser power was added, \"Sense the Prey,\" that will show all living creatures except daedra for a brief moment.

Requirements:
Skyrim

Conflicts:
Anything that mods the Khajiit race

Install:
Place the .esp into the Skyrim/data folder, check the box under data files

If you like the mod, please endorse.

Plans for the future:
- Allow you to toggle detect life as well
author: Contramundi01

files.name: Khajiit Night Eye Toggle and Detect Life Lesser Power
